channel.title: Many questions please help
channel.description:
these are the things i need help with source=project czar
1)making a spec for weopens 2)fixing the command ::makemem(it say wrong syntax try ::make #####) 3)makeing it so that when you use the lever it gives hp also 4)changing where shop keepers go and sell
thanks

item.title: Many questions please help
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

i did what you said to add magic bow spec i did this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 50) {//bow
startAnimation(426);
DDZ();
specialDamage = 35 + misc.random(10);
specialAmount = 35;
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 50) {//bow
startAnimation(426);
DDZ();
specialDamage = 35 + misc.random(10);
specialAmount = 35;

note:didnt copy and paste all brackets

and also did this:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount <= 49) {//magic shortbow
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage(“You do not have enough special energy left.”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 50) {//magic shortbow
startAnimation(2890);
specialDamage = 35 + misc.random(5);
specialAmount -= 35;

note: not all brackets opy and pasted

i tryed specing and all it does is keep the spec on and just attacks normally

item.title: Many questions please help
item.dc:creator: @kaelen92 kaelen92
item.description:
@kaelen92 wrote:

The command ::makemem always works for the owner if you’ve changed it to. if you’re using the source Project Czar go into your Client.java and search either “makemem” (with the quotations in it) or REFORCED it wil say something like else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Reforced") change “reforced” to "yourcharname"and then your ::makemem code should work, remember to not space when making someone a member EX: ::makememkaelen would make me a member. if it says the playername above “wrong syntax try ::make #####” then kick the player 2 times then by the second time they log in they should be a member =) also this is my 100th post!! woot yay for being a senior member! =p

Read full topic
